entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Chipman
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING ENDED, Chipman

entry.title: Friday night: Showers at times heavy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to a few rain showers this evening then to freezing rain before morning. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to ice pellets or snow near noon and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
